Rowdy Wolf:






"I'll be sure to keep my distance," Rowdy Wolf said to KitKat about 
Megatron. "Quickstrike told me about him." There was a hint of darkness to 
his voice that time. The little Fuzor had told him stories about Megatron, 
even the one where in nearly killed him.  But still a question stirred in 
his mind about him and a female. "Last time I saw Quickstrike, he had no 
one." He wasn't sure if he should ask anymore.

He turned his head up a moment to watch where the red flier was heading. He 
had a steady flight towards a cave and mountains.
